title: Multi-INT Asset Planning
description: A planner must coordinate satellite imagery (IMINT), signals intelligence (SIGINT), and a human intelligence (HUMINT) source to find a hidden weapons cache.

tasks.description: Use a HUMINT report to narrow down the search area to a specific village.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner correctly uses the HUMINT to define the initial search box.

tasks.description: Task a SIGINT aircraft to fly over the village to detect any electronic emissions associated with security systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner successfully tasks the SIGINT asset, which detects emissions from one specific compound.

tasks.description: Task an imaging satellite to take high-resolution pictures of the specific compound identified by SIGINT.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner uses the SIGINT to focus the IMINT collection, leading to confirmation of the cache.
